729277f-a.title: Richmond: Poillon Avenue - Hylan Boulevard
729277f-a.text:
Poillon Avenue(right, not seen), east side, south from near
Hylan Boulevard toward Raritan Bay. Near the shore is an old
house, probably the Seguine house on Butler's 1853 map and the
Poillon house on Beers's 1874 map. The second photograph shows
an exclusive view of the hkuse.
August 27, 1930
Views 1 and 2.
P.L.Sperr
NO REPODUCTIONS
729277f-a.folder: Poillon Avenue & Hylan Boulevard, Staten Island, NY
